name: Corona Dodge (iamjcat)
description:
How to play: 

WASD to move and you have 3 lives by default

F4 - Fullscreen

Collect toilet paper and hand sanitizer to increase your score 

Collect the shield power up to protect yourself from coronavirus and corona-chan!

Collect the heart powerup for an extra life

Coronavirus takes one life
Corona-chan follows you and takes away your two lives!
